extendedInfo.description: The world has gone to hell...Dead roam the land...Survivors flee for their lives...The zombie apocalypse has started - the dead are returning to life and attacking the living. You have been chased by the dead across open farmland and have taken shelter in an abandoned farmhouse. Now you must find a way to escape before it's too late...'Escape from the Dead' is a classic point and click adventure game. To survive you must find and use objects, solve puzzles and make your escape from the dead!STUCK?: A walkthrough video has now been posted on youtube. View it here:http://youtu.be/fuV6aN0KwQIFEATURES:+ A classic point & click adventure game, similar to room escape games.+ Graphic novel styled visuals.+ Atmospheric sound effects and music.+ An original and unique storyline featuring a zombie apocalypse.+ Many items to collect and puzzles to solve.+ Game auto-saves as you progress.Note: This game is English language.NOTE: Requires Android OS 2.3 (API 9+) and above to run.Digi-Chain Games on Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/DigiChainGamesDigi-Chain Games on Twitter:https://twitter.com/DigiChainGames

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Itvis a good game just bought it and like the style, but they need to update it as I have completed the first chapter already
reviews.author: Connor Henderson

reviews.comment: Good game but yas need to update for the New chapters, I was just getting into it man :-/
reviews.author: Josh Pearson

reviews.title: Um
reviews.comment: Game isn\'t even completed. Its awful I feel like just gave a dollar to a homeless person. Since when did it become okay for any game and software devs to EVER be allowed to charge for anything that\'s incomplete? Finish your crap before you charge for it. Not that hard.
reviews.author: Erik Heda

reviews.title: Can\'t play it.
reviews.comment: I bought this game because I really wanted to play it, not tap the game wait for it to load and bring back to my phones menu. Please fix this, I love point and click escape games and I love zombies! If fixed I\'ll give a full fice stars, otherwise I want my money back!
reviews.author: ben kennesy

reviews.title: Short but Sweet!
reviews.comment: Yes, the game is short but quality is not sacrificed. This point and click adventure is intriguing and challenging enough to justify a 5 star rating.The $1.00 spent is well worth it. I have spent a lot more on games only to be extremely disappointed. I can\'t wait for the next chapter and will have qualms about purchasing it. Great Job DIGI-CHAIN GAMES.
reviews.author: Nick Murdic

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: What is the writing for in the bathroom wall for? Help please!! .
reviews.author: Jack Bowyer

reviews.title: Chapter 2!!
reviews.comment: Awesome!! Hurry up and post Chapter 2! :D
reviews.author: L. BellShock

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Very short and easy, but all of Digi Chains games are just amazing. Anxiously awaiting update, will keep checking back.
reviews.author: Danielle Hickenbotham

reviews.title: Escape the dead
reviews.comment: Very good game worth a dollar time now I just have to wait for the second part so hopefully it comes soon
reviews.author: brandon laudermilk
